评论详情: I absolutely love this acid wash hoodie! The vintage, distressed look gives it a cool, unique vibe that stands out from other hoodies. It’s oversized, which makes it super comfortable and perfect for lounging or layering. The heavyweight material keeps me warm without feeling too bulky. Whether I’m out with friends or just chilling at home, it’s become one of my go-to pieces. It’s also a great option for couples since it has that relaxed, unisex fit. Definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a cozy, stylish hoodie that’s both trendy and comfortable!
The hoodie is very thick and durable. The only problem is that its really easily stainable with grease and difficult to wash out.

评论概述: No inner lining, do not buy
评论详情: There is no fuzzy inner lining inside. The picture clearly shows there being a fuzzy lining inside and mine just came with a rougher almost towel like lining. Almost like it wasn’t finished in the factory. Definitely not as warm because of the lack of lining. Do not buy these.

This hoodie has a good and classic style letting you wear it most anytime.  Not too thin, but also no so thick either, this lets you wear it for most weather and temps.  The pictures do a good job of showing the style and what you will get and the size received matched up to what was ordered.  I didn't find any problems with the quality or make either.
I bought this sweatshirt as a gift. She Loves it, and was so happy!! Thank you for a great quality gift, and for your quick delivery!! I will definitely buy your products again!!!
this sweatshirt is super comfy. it fits baggy so perfect for the oversized look. i'm a M and got a size L
The size is accurate. I sized up for an oversized look. The quality is good. Its good fabric, very soft and flexible. The color is nice. Good value for money

The Acid Washed Hoodie is a stylish addition to any wardrobe, featuring a unique vintage wash that sets it apart. It’s soft and comfortable, ideal for lounging or casual outings, and has a relaxed fit for easy layering. Available in various colors, each hoodie has its own distinct pattern. Overall, it combines comfort with a fashionable edge, making it a must-have for casual style!
The quality of the fabric is exceptional. It drapes nicely, is warm, and has just enough distressing to look cool, but not abused. It quickly turned into one of my favorite sweatshirts!

评论概述: Fits great, not thrilled with the worn edges
评论详情: This fit well, no issues there.  The material is thick and comfy.  I am not happy with the fact that the cuffs and the edges have what look like small incisions every so often... if you wash this enough, the material will start to shred at those points.  I guess that is a "look" it is just not one I am happy with.  It is a shame, because otherwise, this is a great hoodie.  Despite the heavy material, which is great, I would never pay this much for an item that will look worn and trashy after a few months of wear.

This acid-wash hoodie is EVERYTHING. The vintage, grungy 90s look is on point, and both my teens are constantly fighting over it (which speaks volumes about how cool it is).  🌟 What I Love:  Style: The distressed wash and oversized fit nail the retro aesthetic perfectly. It feels like stepping back into the 90s in the best way. Comfort: It’s super soft on the inside and cozy enough for chilly days without being too bulky. Unisex Appeal: The fit and style are great for anyone, making it versatile enough to share (if you’re lucky enough to get it back). 🎭 Perfect For:  Lounging at home, streetwear outfits, or layering for an effortlessly cool vibe. Pairing with leggings, jeans, or shorts—it just works with everything. 🧼 Care Tips: Be gentle with it! Follow the care instructions to keep the acid wash looking fab without over-fading.  This hoodie is comfy, stylish, and worth every penny. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to channel some grungy, nostalgic goodness! 🖤✨

Nice, cozy oversized hoodie. I do believe it is sized more for men. I'm normally a women's large and ordered a medium--it is VERY oversized but that's what I wanted so I'm fine with it. My partner wears a men's size large and it's loose on him as well.  It is more than 50% cotton so it's going to be a bit stiffer than people may be used to for full synthetic materials. However, I prefer natural materials for environmental reasons and it does make the hoodie extra cozy.  I got this in green and while this should be common sense, definitely make sure to wash this alone for the first go. I washed it with dark clothing but one white sock snuck it's way into the load, and the sock is now a lovely mint green (my mistake!).

This hoodie seems to fit true to size. I usually wear a 1XL but I ordered this in a 2XL so that I would have room to wear other shirts under it and use it as an extra layer underneath my regular coat.  It would stand fine in its own as a in between season outer wear. The denium type material shows the faded stone washing color quite nicely.  It really gives the hoodie that well worn comfy look.  It does not have sweatshirt fleece material on the inside but it's really not needed with the thickness of the denium like material.

This package was so heavy when it arrived, I didn't think it was a hoodie inside. This is heavy and cotton and very well made. I ordered my usual size and it fit just as I expected. The acid wash makes the blue look just like denim. The cuffs and other trim has a "worn" look to it, too.

I love this hoodie. I have been wearing it to work with a pair of work-appropriate leggings and I always get compliments on it. I am a plus-size woman and I got my correct size and it fits fantastic. It's made well, warm, and comfortable with good stitching, sleeves that go down as far as they should and don't ride up like some inferior hoodies and the acid wash is very attractive. I would highly suggest adding this hoodie to any wardrobe. It's a great and safe neutral.
It is VERY heavy fabric, even being labeled heavyweight.  The color is okay.  The fit is oversized, but not too big.  The price is way too much.

This acid-wash hoodie is everything I hoped for and more. The distressed look gives it a genuine vintage vibe, and the heavyweight material is incredibly soft and cozy. It's the perfect blend of style and comfort.  The oversized fit is perfect for layering, and the neutral color goes with everything. Whether I'm running errands or lounging at home, this hoodie has become a go-to piece in my wardrobe. It's the perfect way to add a touch of edgy style to any outfit.  If you're looking for a versatile and stylish hoodie, I highly recommend this one. It's a must-have for any fashion-forward individual.
This hoodie is so good. It’s a poly cotton blend and washes and dries well. It’s heavy and warm and perfectly oversized. You do not need to size up for the oversized look.

评论概述: Very comfy, true to size, Love!!
评论详情: This hoodie is a lot better quality than I expected. It is made from very thick and warm material, it almost feels like it is lined.  The color gives a denim vibe, its so soft and comfortable, and fir perfectly.  True to size.You need one of these hoodies, especially in the colder weather.  Highly recommend!

This hoodie is VERY OVERSIZED! I knew this going in, so sized down. My daughter (who is a size 2-4) tried it on and was swimming in it! Still, it seems well-made and looks nice. It seems comfy and cozy. Though I am pleased with it, overall, I’m not sure I’d say it’s a tremendous value, as it’s still an off-brand item.

This is a thick and heavy sweatshirt.  Good quality material and warm.  Fits a little on the large size.  No draw string for hoodie if that matters to you.  Seems like a good all around value.  I would recommend this sweatshirt.

This is a substantial Hoodie. Heavy and bulky but not warm. I walked my dog this morning in 50°. My regular sweatshirt keeps me warmer. The neck is a bit tight but the hood stays up. It's cool looking and comfortable but not really a practical jacket. I got the Medium because I knew it would be oversized and it's my regular size for tops. I've washed it in cold water and dried it on permanent press. This color did not bleed and did not shrink. I am 5'5", 145. Their description says you can go to a party orgy and surf in it. IF I do wear it during either of these activities, and haven't drowned from wearing it in the ocean, I'll be sure to edit my review with an update!

This hoodie is awesome for lounging or casual outings. The acid wash gives it a cool, vintage vibe, and the oversized fit makes it super comfortable. The heavyweight fabric keeps me cozy, and I love how the distressed details give it some personality. The brown color is versatile, and it pairs well with anything. Whether you’re chilling at home or heading out, this hoodie is perfect for any casual occasion.

评论概述: Love the look, but slightly disappointed with the material.
评论详情: I love the vintage/distressed appearance of this hoodie. The fit is true but oversized, so I ordered a small instead of my regular medium and it fits perfectly with plenty of space (I am 5'5, 145 lbs, usually wear an 8/10, 38C chest and 31" waisted female). However, the material was a bit of a disappointment for me. I expected a really soft feel, esp on the inside, and instead it is kind of a weighted material/heavy feeling but super thin at the same time. For the price, I want it to feel luxurious when I put it on. There doesn't feel like much of a lining inside of it, and it isn't overly soft. Hopefully with multiple washings, it will get softer. It truly reminds me of a thin denim material in appearance and in how it feels.
The washed look on the sweatshirt is nice and it is pretty large, which I like. This is a great sweatshirt to have for the winter months.

This hoodie is well made overall. I really like the lined hoodie. My youngest likes acid wash so I got it for him. It isn’t a huge value at $60 but it well done overall. Size down if you are in between. This one is definitely over sized.

评论概述: Comfort Meets Vintage Style with This Acid Wash Hoodie
评论详情: I recently got this hoodie and it’s quickly become a staple in my wardrobe.  Made from 100% cotton, the hoodie feels soft, and the brushed terry lining adds an extra layer of warmth and coziness. I like the weight of the fabric and the quality of the stitching.  The acid wash finish gives it a unique vintage vibe, while the oversized fit provides a laid-back, trendy look. I also appreciate the ribbed cuffs and hem that help maintain the shape.  The kangaroo pocket is spacious and perfect for keeping hands warm or carrying small essentials. This hoodie truly works for everyone. The loose, oversized style makes it great for layering or just wearing on its own for a relaxed vibe.  Whether you’re lounging at home, running errands, or heading out for a casual meet-up, this hoodie is ideal. It’s also durable enough for outdoor activities like hiking or cycling while still being stylish enough for streetwear.  This hoodie checks all the boxes: comfort, style, and practicality. The acid wash finish and oversized fit make it stand out while being incredibly cozy to wear all day. Definitely recommend for anyone looking to elevate their casual wardrobe with a vintage-inspired piece!
